This clash of the tech titans is captured by POLITICO's Elizabeth Wasserman in a slice of the type of reporting you can expect from POLITICO Pro. Google is under siege in Washington like never before- and it says an "anti-Google industrial complex' is to blame. In an interview with POLITICO, a Google spokesman argued that a cabal of antitrust lawyers, lobbyists and public relations firms is conspiring against the Internet search giant. The mastermind? Google says it's Microsoft, Wasserman reports. "Maybe it's irony, or maybe it"s payback.
